response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. Given its importance to you, I believe it's essential to find the right balance between its worth and your budget. After careful consideration, I propose a price of $900,000 for the product. This offer reflects my desire to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I am confident that this price allows you to secure the item at a fair value while also enabling me to realize a reasonable return on its worth. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
